original: Udāna 5.3
analyzed: udāna

original: Suppabuddhakuṭṭhisutta
analyzed: suppabuddhakuṭṭhi sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī ahosi—
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājagahe suppabuddhaḥ nāma kuṭṭhī ahosi

original: manussadaliddo, manussakapaṇo, manussavarāko.
analyzed: manussa daliddaḥ manussa kapaṇaḥ manussa varākaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṁ desento nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivutaḥ dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti

original: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī taṁ mahājanakāyaṁ dūratova sannipatitaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī tam mahā jana kāyam dūratas va sannipatita

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: “nissaṁsayaṁ kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhājīyati.
analyzed: nissasayam kho ettha kiñci khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā bhājīyati

original: Yannūnāhaṁ yena so mahājanakāyo tenupasaṅkameyyaṁ.
analyzed: yat nūna aham yena saḥ mahā jana kāyaḥ tena upasaṅkameyya

original: Appeva nāmettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā labheyyan”ti.
analyzed: appa iva nāma ittha kiñci khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā labheyyanti

original: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī yena so mahājanakāyo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī yena saḥ mahā jana kāyaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṁ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṁ dhammaṁ desentaṁ nisinnaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī bhagavantam mahatiyā parisāya parivutam dhammaṃ desentam nisinna

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: “na kho ettha kiñci khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhājīyati.
analyzed: na kho ettha kiñci khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā bhājīyati

original: Samaṇo ayaṁ gotamo parisati dhammaṁ deseti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ ayam gotamaḥ parisati dhammam deseti

original: Yannūnāhampi dhammaṁ suṇeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham pi dhammam suṇeyyanti

original: Tattheva ekamantaṁ nisīdi:
analyzed: tattha iva ekamantam nisīdi

original: “ahampi dhammaṁ sossāmī”ti.
analyzed: aham pi dhammam sossāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sabbāvantaṁ parisaṁ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sabbāvantam parisam cetasā cetaḥ paricca manasā akāsi

original: “ko nu kho idha bhabbo dhammaṁ viññātun”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho idha bhabbaḥ dhammam viññātunti

original: Addasā kho bhagavā suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ tassaṁ parisāyaṁ nisinnaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā suppabuddham kuṭṭhim tassam parisāyam nisinna

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho idha bhabbo dhammaṁ viññātun”ti.
analyzed: ayam kho idha bhabbaḥ dhammam viññātunti

original: Suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ ārabbha anupubbiṁ kathaṁ kathesi, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: suppabuddham kuṭṭhim ārabbha anupubbim katham kathesi

original: dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ saggakathaṁ; kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṅkilesaṁ; nekkhamme ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsesi.
analyzed: dāna katham sīla katham sagga katha kāmānam ādīnavam okāram saṅkilesa nekkhamme ānisasam pakāsesi

original: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ kallacittaṁ muducittaṁ vinīvaraṇacittaṁ udaggacittaṁ pasannacittaṁ, atha yā buddhānaṁ sāmukkaṁsikā dhammadesanā taṁ pakāsesi—
analyzed: yadā bhagavā aññāsi suppabuddham kuṭṭhim kalla cittam mudu cittam vinīvaraṇa cittam udagga cittam pasanna citta atha yā buddhānam sāmukkasikā dhamma desanā tam pakāsesi

original: dukkhaṁ, samudayaṁ, nirodhaṁ, maggaṁ.
analyzed: dukkha samudaya nirodha magga

original: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṁ vatthaṁ apagatakāḷakaṁ sammadeva rajanaṁ paṭiggaṇheyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma suddham vattham apagata kāḷakam sammat eva rajanam paṭiggaṇheyya

original: evamevaṁ suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa tasmiṁyeva āsane virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi:
analyzed: evam evam suppabuddhassa kuṭṭhissa tasmiyā eva āsane virajam vīta malam dhamma cakkhum udapādi

original: “yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman”ti.
analyzed: yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti

original: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo
analyzed: atha kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī diṭṭha dhammo patta dhammo vidita dhammo pariyogāḷha dhammo

original: tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthu sāsane uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: tiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ vigata kathaṅkathaḥ vesārajja ppatto apara paccayo satthu sāsane uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Abhikkantaṁ, bhante, abhikkantaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: abhikkanta bhante abhikkanta bhante

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhagavatā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhagavatā aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aha bhante bhagavantam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇa upetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Atha kho suppabuddho kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito
analyzed: atha kho suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ

original: sampahaṁsito bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
analyzed: sampahasitaḥ bhagavatā bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā

original: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho acirapakkantaṁ suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi.
analyzed: atha kho acira pakkantam suppabuddham kuṭṭhim gāvī taruṇa vacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “yo so, bhante, suppabuddho nāma kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito, so kālaṅkato.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhante suppabuddhaḥ nāma kuṭṭhī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ saḥ kālaṅkato

original: Tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti?
analyzed: tassa kā gati kaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ ti

original: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kuṭṭhī; paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṁ; na ca maṁ dhammādhikaraṇaṁ vihesesi.
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ bhikkhave suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī paccapādi dhammassa anudhamma na ca mama dhamma adhikaraṇam vihesesi

original: Suppabuddho, bhikkhave, kuṭṭhī tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
analyzed: suppabuddhaḥ bhikkhave kuṭṭhī tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā sotāpannaḥ a vinipāta dhammo niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇo ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte aññataraḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena suppabuddho kuṭṭhī ahosi—
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī ahosi

original: manussadaliddo, manussakapaṇo, manussavarāko”ti?
analyzed: manussa daliddaḥ manussa kapaṇaḥ manussa varākaḥ iti

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kuṭṭhī imasmiṁyeva rājagahe seṭṭhiputto ahosi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhikkhave suppabuddhaḥ kuṭṭhī imasmiya eva rājagahe seṭṭhi putto ahosi

original: So uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyanto addasa tagarasikhiṁ paccekabuddhaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya pavisantaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ uyyāna bhūmim niyyantaḥ addasa tagarasikhim paccekabuddham nagaram piṇḍāya pavisanta

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: ‘kvāyaṁ kuṭṭhī kuṭṭhicīvarena vicaratī’ti?
analyzed: kva ayam kuṭṭhī kuṭṭhi cīvarena vicarati iti

original: Niṭṭhubhitvā apasabyato karitvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: niṭṭhubhitvā apasabyataḥ karitvā pakkāmi

original: So tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccittha.
analyzed: saḥ tassa kammassa vipākena bahūni vassa satāni bahūni vassa sahassāni bahūni vassa sata sahassāni niraye paccittha

original: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imasmiṁyeva rājagahe kuṭṭhī ahosi manussadaliddo, manussakapaṇo, manussavarāko.
analyzed: tassa iva kammassa vipāka avasesena imasmiya eva rājagahe kuṭṭhī ahosi manussa daliddaḥ manussa kapaṇaḥ manussa varākaḥ

original: So tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ āgamma saddhaṁ samādiyi sīlaṁ samādiyi sutaṁ samādiyi cāgaṁ samādiyi paññaṁ samādiyi.
analyzed: so tathāgata ppaveditam dhamma vinayam āgamma saddham samādiyi sīlam samādiyi sutam samādiyi cāgam samādiyi paññam samādiyi

original: So tathāgatappaveditaṁ dhammavinayaṁ āgamma saddhaṁ samādiyitvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā
analyzed: saḥ tathāgata ppaveditam dhamma vinayam āgamma saddham samādiyitvā sīlam samādiyitvā

original: sutaṁ samādiyitvā cāgaṁ samādiyitvā paññaṁ samādiyitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā
analyzed: sutam samādiyitvā cāgam samādiyitvā paññam samādiyitvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā

original: sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapanno devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sahabyataṁ.
analyzed: sugatim saggam lokam upapannaḥ devānam tāvati sānam

original: So tattha aññe deve atirocati vaṇṇena ceva yasasā cā”ti.
analyzed: so tattha aññe deve atirocati vaṇṇena ca iva yasasā ca ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Cakkhumā visamānīva,
analyzed: cakkhumā

original: vijjamāne parakkame;
analyzed: vijjamāne parakkame

original: Paṇḍito jīvalokasmiṁ,
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ

original: pāpāni parivajjaye”ti.
analyzed: pāpāni parivajjaya iti

original: Tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: tatiya
